alert.note: Alert for Knox; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 5:29PM EDT until August 20 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL RICHLAND AND NORTHWESTERN KNOX COUNTIES... At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bellville, or 12 miles north of Mount Vernon, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Fredericktown and Waterford. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
